        From the manufacturer


        About La Roche-Posay

        Recommended by 90,000 dermatologists worldwide*, La Roche-Posay offers unique daily skincare developed using a strict formulation charter and stringent clinical testing for efficacy and safety, even on sensitive skin.

        *Survey on the dermocosmetic market carried out by IQVIA and other partners between November 2018 and July 2019 among dermatologists in 46 countries representing more than 80% of the worldwide GDP.

        Cicaplast Hands Instant Relief Hydrating Hand Cream with Shea Butter

        Product Information

        Cicaplast Hands wraps hands in an invisible glove-like layer to leave them feeling soft, smooth and hydrated. This hand cream is resistant to washing, immediately soothes dry hands and provides 48hr hydration. Formulated with Niacinamide, Shea Butter, and Glycerin, skin feels soothed while helping replenish lost moisture. Suitable for dry to very dry hands damaged by aggressions such as cold weather and frequent hand-washing. It has a fast-absorbing texture and a non-greasy, non-sticky finish.

        • Dermatologist Tested for Safety*
        • Allergy Tested*
        • Suitable for Sensitive Skin*
        • Fragrance-Free*
        • Paraben-Free*
        • Accepted by National Eczema Association
        • *Validated by L'Oral Active Cosmetics Division, 2020

        Formulation

        Cicaplast Hands is a nourishing, moisturizing hand cream that wraps hands in an invisible glove-like layer and leaves them feeling soft, smooth, and hydrated. This cream immediately soothes dry, damaged hands and provides up to 48hr hydration.

        Niacinamide: A form of vitamin B3 with soothing properties.

        Shea Butter: Known for its hydrating and nourishing properties.

        High Concentration of Glycerin: A moisturizing agent that naturally attracts water to skin.

        How to Use

        Apply cream to hands as needed.

        Fast-absorbing texture. Non-greasy, non-sticky finish. Resistant to washing.

        This hand cream is for dry to very dry hands damaged by aggressions at home and work such as dry air, cold weather, frequent hand-washing, and exposure to chemicals.

        Dermatological Expertise

        La Roche-Posay is committed to making dermatological skin care accessible to those who need it, by partnering with dermatologists from the development to the recommendation of our skin care products. We are committed to offering highly effective products that can be tolerated by even sensitive skin

        La Roche Posay Thermal Spring Water

        La Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water: Sourced in La Roche-Posay, France, this thermal spring water is naturally rich in minerals with scientifically demonstrated soothing and antioxidant properties.

            How customer reviews and ratings work

            Customer Reviews, including Product Star Ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them.

            To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness.

            Learn more how customers reviews work on Amazon
